Prerequisites: A GRADE OF C OR HIGHER IN ACG 4111 OR EQUIVALENT, 60 CREDITS EARNED
Course Description:
EXAMINES OPERATIONAL AUDITING AS A PROFESSIONAL DISCIPLINE FOR TESTING AND EVALUATING TOTALITY OF PLANNING AND OPERATING CONTROLS; PARTICULAR ATTENTION TO DEVELOPMENT, SELLING AND
IMPLEMENTATION OF RECOMMENDATIONS FOR OPERATING
IMPROVEMENT AND COST CONTAINMENT.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
